author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Saturday told the Assembly that a ‘manimandapam’ would be constructed in memory of farmers’ leader Narayanasamy Naidu at Vaiyampalayam in Coimbatore district.

She also announced a solatium to the family members of farmers who were killed in the police firing between 1970 and 1980.

A total of 47 farmers were killed and seven farmers had no legal heir.

“The government will pay Rs. 5 lakh each to the legal heir of the 40 farmers and it will cost the government Rs. 2 crore,” she said.
title: Memorial for Narayanasamy Naidu
